message: In a constantly evolving landscape, the intersection of legal and business ethics is often tricky to navigate! In our next Justia Webinar, we’re exploring why legal and business ethics don’t always work well together and how to stay ahead of the pack.

Join The Law Schack Founding Partner Thomas Shack on Friday, December 1 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT for our next free Justia Webinar, Ethical Evolution: Thriving at the Crossroads of Law and Business in the AI Era.
bottomline: Get Your Seat Before Spaces Are Gone!
message3: *Please note: This presentation has been approved for Minimum Continuing Legal Education credit by the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE in the amount of one credit hour, of which one hour will apply to legal ethics credit. It is also approved for 1.0 of Legal Ethics Credit in California, North Carolina, and South Carolina (all levels).
While the presentation is free for all lawyers to attend, attorneys seeking CLE credit must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro.

message: Legal and business ethics are frequently in conflict. How do lawyers navigate this constantly evolving landscape? We’re exploring this question in our next Justia Webinar - happening in just one week!

Join The Law Schack Founding Partner Thomas Shack on Friday, December 1 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT for our next free Justia Webinar, Ethical Evolution: Thriving at the Crossroads of Law and Business in the AI Era.
